response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $900,000, which I believe is a fair reflection of its worth and the potential it can bring to you. I am confident that you will find this investment worthwhile and rewarding. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 900000}
